message: By the Way , Did any one try the All new Visual Studio?

data.message: don't want to get my memory full so No :)
I did. The new colour is such a major turn off for me though that I rarely use it. Even the dark theme is broken in some area.
I wrote a blog post about something I discovered when I first used it though http://bit.ly/_referencesjs
They try to catch the gui of ms expression suite, that i think also stolen from adobe ..

I won't get into "steeling" discussions because they usually don't interest me, but anyway, the new UI is actually Zune and "Metro" inspired, that is the Windows 8 UI not Expression UI. You'd feel this especially from the unified-colour icons for example
